sectionClasses: py-20 md:py-28 lg:py-36 bg-white relative overflow-hidden

hero-decorative-element absolute bottom-20 left-[5%] w-80 h-80 bg-[#5045E8] opacity-[0.04] rounded-full blur-3xl
hero-decorative-element absolute top-1/2 left-1/3 w-40 h-40 bg-[#EEAE22] opacity-[0.03] rounded-full blur-2xl

container.classes: container max-w-6xl mx-auto px-6 relative z-10
container.contentClasses: flex flex-col md:flex-row gap-14 lg:gap-20 items-start

badge.classes: section-title inline-block px-5 py-2 bg-blue-100 text-blue-700 text-sm font-medium rounded-full mb-5 shadow-sm

title.classes: section-title text-3xl md:text-4xl lg:text-5xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-6 relative

underline.classes: absolute -bottom-4 left-0 w-32 h-1.5 bg-gradient-to-r from-[#EEAE22] to-[#F5C462] rounded-full

description.text: The principles that guide our work and shape our community, driving innovation and positive impact.
description.classes: section-description text-base md:text-lg text-gray-700 mb-10 leading-relaxed font-medium

valueBox.containerClasses: value-box bg-gradient-to-br from-gray-50 to-white rounded-xl p-7 border border-gray-100 w-full shadow-lg transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-1 relative overflow-hidden

decorativeElements.classes: absolute top-0 right-0 w-32 h-32 bg-gradient-to-br from-[#EEAE22]/5 to-[#F5C462]/5 rounded-full -mr-10 -mt-10
absolute bottom-0 left-0 w-24 h-24 bg-gradient-to-br from-[#EEAE22]/5 to-[#F5C462]/5 rounded-full -ml-8 -mb-8

iconContainer.classes: w-14 h-14 rounded-full bg-gradient-to-br from-[#0066FF] to-[#5045E8] flex items-center justify-center flex-shrink-0 shadow-lg

description.text: We encourage original thinking and support the development of creative solutions to real-world challenges.

rightContent.containerClasses: w-full md:flex-1 grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 gap-8 md:gap-10
rightContent.cardClasses: value-card bg-white rounded-xl overflow-hidden shadow-lg border border-gray-100 transition-all duration-300 group hover:-translate-y-2 hover:shadow-xl

cardHeader.containerClasses: p-6 flex items-center justify-center transition-all duration-300 relative h-24

decorativeElements.classes: absolute top-0 right-0 w-20 h-20 rounded-full bg-white/10 -mr-5 -mt-5
absolute bottom-0 left-0 w-12 h-12 rounded-full bg-white/10 -ml-4 -mb-4

iconContainer.classes: icon-container w-16 h-16 rounded-full bg-white/20 backdrop-blur-sm flex items-center justify-center transition-all duration-300 group-hover:scale-110 shadow-lg z-10

title.classes: text-xl md:text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 transition-colors duration-300 group-hover:text-[#0066FF]

description.classes: text-gray-700 text-base md:text-lg mb-6 leading-relaxed font-medium

learnMore.containerClasses: flex items-center text-base md:text-lg font-semibold text-[#0066FF] transition-all duration-300 group-hover:translate-x-1

icon.classes: w-5 h-5 ml-2 transition-transform duration-300 group-hover:translate-x-1

values.title: Collaboration
values.description: We believe in the power of teamwork and foster partnerships among students, faculty, and industry to drive collective growth.

values.title: Leadership
values.description: We nurture confident, responsible individuals who take initiative, inspire others, and lead with integrity.

values.title: Inclusivity
values.description: We embrace diversity and ensure equal opportunities for all, creating a respectful and supportive learning environment.

values.title: Social Responsibility
values.description: We are committed to making a positive impact on society through ethical practices and community engagement.
